metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17509 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
ATS negative cache option is vulnerable to a cache poisoning attack. If you have this option enabled, please upgrade or disable this feature. Apache Traffic Server versions 7.0.0 to 7.1.11 and 8.0.0 to 8.1.0 are affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-17509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

trafficserver - 8.1.1+ds-1
trafficserver-experimental-plugins - 8.1.1+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.1+ds-1').
